alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds in which the largest metallic oxoanion is chromate, to which either no atom or a non metal atom is bonded.
alternative_parents.name: Miscellaneous chromates

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic halogenic compounds in which the heaviest metal atom is a post-transition metal.
alternative_parents.name: Post-transition metal salts

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic chemical compounds with one or more oxygen atoms combined with another element.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic salts containing a lead ion.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic lead salts

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds in which hydrogen is bonded to a more electropositive element or group. Usually, they contain one or more hydrogen centers having nucleophilic, reducing, or basic properties.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic hydrides

class.description: Inorganic oxoanionic compounds in which the heaviest atom not in an oxoanion is a post-transition metal.
class.name: Post-transition metal oxoanionic compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as post-transition metal chromates. These are inorganic compounds in which the largest oxoanion is chromate, and in which the heaviest atom is a post-transition metal.

direct_parent.description: Inorganic compounds in which the largest oxoanion is chromate, and in which the heaviest atom is a post-transition metal.
direct_parent.name: Post-transition metal chromates

kingdom.description: Compounds that do not contain a C atom. Exceptions are made for isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon trioxide, carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Inorganic compounds

subclass.description: Inorganic compounds in which the largest oxoanion is chromate, and in which the heaviest atom is a post-transition metal.
subclass.name: Post-transition metal chromates

superclass.description: Compounds that contains both metal and non metal atoms.
superclass.name: Mixed metal/non-metal compounds
